title: Basic Requirements To Start Your Own Pig Farm

tasks.task: Starting a pig farm requires several physical tasks related to setting up the infrastructure.
subtasks: Identify a suitable space to keep pigs (intensive system).
Construct a feeding trough for pigs.
Ensure a solid flooring to prevent pig digging.
Provide a watering system (trough, wallow, shower, or automatic system).
Install a water tank and pumping machine.
Erect a roof to protect pigs from weather.
Gather necessary tools (buckets, shovels, brooms) for farm operations.
Prepare disinfectants for maintaining hygiene on the farm.

tasks.task: Assembling required farm equipment and infrastructure.
subtasks: Install feeding troughs throughout the pen.
Apply waterproof coating or implement a wallowing area.
Set up a water tank and connect it to a pumping system.
Cover the pig pen with a durable roof structure.
Lay out solid flooring material resistant to pig damage.
Securely fasten all equipment and shelters for safety.
